data.description:
Metaapes Bizshow is a platform for business to create a presence in Metaverse. 

We host Expos, Conventions for you to meet the potential partners or future customers. 

We also host customize events for your business needs.

changelog.change_log: To who it may concern, We use AgoraEngine https://www.agora.io/en/ to manage voice synchronisation, the following permission are required by their API even we do not use then directly. We do not currently have code require the following permission. the app requires user to login to our backend system, I have provided test account below : User name: test Password: 123456789
